name: Eonic Drifter
description: The Eonic Drifter is a uniquely humanoid creature with a mix of magical and physical abilities, wearing leather armor and possessing an impressive intelligence.
memorable: Its ability to manipulate time through its Drift Forward skill makes it a disorienting and formidable foe.
goals: The Eonic Drifter seeks to use its abilities to confuse and disrupt its opponents in combat.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other chaotic entities or creatures that are also concerned with time and magic.
environment: Typically found in chaotic or magical realms.
strengths: Possesses strong magical capabilities and good agility, making it a clever combatant.
weaknesses: Low physical strength and low passive perception may leave it susceptible in direct confrontations.
attacks: Uses a Time-Warping Staff to inflict bludgeoning and force damage, as well as a psychic attack through its special abilities.
most_powerful_ability: Drift Forward can disorient targets, pulling them through time and causing them psychological distress.
senses: Has a passive perception of 10, indicating average awareness of surroundings.
skills: Highly proficient in Arcana and History, showcasing its deep magical knowledge.
additional_information: Can summon a future version of itself for assistance.
The future self can attack or aid in combat.
If the future self is destroyed, the Drifter risks being stunned.
Immunity to poison and psychic damage for its future self.
Resistances to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for its future self.
test_queries: humanoid that manipulates time in combat
chaotic unique creature with magical skills
intelligent drifter that confuses its enemies
magical humanoid using a staff in battle
